title: VP of Engineering / CTO
content:
Manticore is looking for an experienced Engineering leader with strong technical skills and the ability to mentor and lead a high-performing organization of outstanding engineers and engineering leaders. You’ll lead and facilitate key technical decisions, effective communication across multiple disciplines, technical implementation, and drive prioritization and execution for the team. You and your team will push Manticore Games to the next level, building a new, expansive, and complex MMO. This role reports directly to the CEO. Our headquarters are located in San Mateo, CA but this role can be fully remote.
Responsibilities

Strategically align the technology vision with the short and longer-term business strategy, and communicate that vision to the company
Manage and grow an exceptional engineering department with diverse skills and experience levels, providing both technical and organizational leadership
Lead technical direction and set overall system architecture to enable highly scalable code base
Set aggressive development milestone goals at a maintainable pace, and ensure those goals are achieved on target, on time, and meeting our expectations for quality  code
Partner with your peers in Production and Product to build a long term roadmap, set schedules, and allocate resources
Partner with Finance to develop efficient, scalable infrastructure with low overhead and operating costs
Drive due diligence and selection of potential technical partners, libraries, and other technologies and tools
Audit and enforce engineering best practices, coding standards, and development methodologies to ensure successful delivery of a high-quality, scalable, and maintainable product
Produce service level goals for the infrastructure team, including considerations for security, user experience, cost, data retention, and development speed
Maintain expert knowledge and insight into recent trends in the tech and gaming spaces

Requirements

15+ years of experience, with a significant amount building multiplayer online games
10+ years of management experience
Several shipped games, especially those with an online component or UGC
Extensive knowledge and experience with a variety of technologies and languages including C++, Unreal Engine, and Perforce
Ability to find effective, result-oriented resolutions when faced with competing priorities and unexpected needs  
Strong business acumen that can drive technology related decisions to support the company's objectives and vision
Proven experience hiring and mentoring a top-notch engineering team
Excellent verbal and written communication skills with the ability to productively communicate with technical and non-technical people


Perks


Medical, Dental, Vision & Life/AD&D Insurance
401(k)
Maternity & Parental Leave
Flexible PTO
Flexible Spending Accounts
Commuter Benefits
ADP Employee Discount Program
Daily Lunch (in office only)
Free Snacks & Beverages (in office only)

$220,000/year to $300,000/year
A reasonable estimate of the current US base salary range for this position is salary (the range listed above) + equity + benefits. Our salary ranges are determined by role, level, and location. The range displayed on each job posting reflects the minimum and maximum target for new hire salaries for the position across all US locations. Within that range, individual pay is determined by work location and additional factors, including but not limited to job-related skill sets, experience and training, education, licensure and certifications, and other business and organizational needs. Please note that the compensation details listed in US role postings reflect the base salary only, and do not include discretionary bonus (if any, based on individual and organizational performance), equity, or benefits. 
Your recruiter can share more about the specific salary range for your preferred location during the hiring process.
